about_the_game:
Welcome to the Wacky World of Gums Gang


Dive into an eccentric and surprise-filled adventure with this multiplayer first-person shooter. Imagine a world where reality has been shaken in a cosmic blender, producing an explosive cocktail of vivid colors, quirky characters, and improbable scenarios.

**Fun Game Modes with Friends**

Team Deathmatch
Free-for-All
Co-op Survival
Jump

Fight your enemies with a multitude of wacky weapons and gadgets.

Customize your Gums however you like with Gums coins.

Welcome to the Wacky World of Gums Gang


Dive into an eccentric and surprise-filled adventure with this multiplayer first-person shooter. Imagine a world where reality has been shaken in a cosmic blender, producing an explosive cocktail of vivid colors, quirky characters, and improbable scenarios.

Fight your enemies with a multitude of wacky weapons and gadgets.

Customize your Gums however you like with Gums coins.

name: Gums Gang

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Subject to changes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Subject to changes

short_description: Welcome to the Wild and Wacky World of Gums GangDive into a multiplayer first-person shooter full of surprises and eccentric adventures. Discover a vivid and quirky world with explosive scenarios.
